Pre-Game Insights: The Charlotte Hornets have lost 17 of their last 18 games and are aiming to snap a nine-game losing streak.
The Cleveland Cavaliers have won 13 of their past 14 games and are looking for a 10th straight victory.

The Cavaliers have covered the spread in seven of their last eight games, while the Hornets have failed to cover the spread in eight of their last 10 night games against Central Division opponents with a winning record.
The Hornets have won four of their last six games as road underdogs against the Cavaliers following a loss.
